NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
TWCRSF 0..*Element臺灣癌症登記短表之資料模型
This logical model cannot be the target of a reference
caseConfirmation 1..1BackboneElement癌症登記之個案確認
organizationIdentifier 1..1Identifier1.1 申報醫院代碼（Organization Profile.identifier）
subject 1..1Element癌症登記之病患資訊
medicalRecordNumber 1..1Identifier1.2 病歷號碼（Patient Profile.identifier）
name 1..1HumanName1.3 姓名（Patient Profile.name）
idNumber 1..1Identifier1.4 身分證統一編號（Patient Profile.identifier）
gender 1..1code1.5 性別（Patient Profile.gender）
birthDate 1..1date1.6 出生日期（Patient Profile.birthDate）
postalCode 1..1string1.7 戶籍地代碼（Patient Profile.address.postalCode）
cancerConfirmation 1..1BackboneElement癌症登記之癌症確認
diagnosis 1..1Element癌症個案之診斷與分類
diagnosisAge 1..1Age2.1 診斷年齡（Condition Profile.onsetAge）
sequenceNumber 1..1CodeableConcept2.2 癌症發生順序號碼（Condition Profile.code）
classOfCase 1..1CodeableConcept2.3 個案分類（Condition Profile.category）
classOfDiagnosisStatus 1..1CodeableConcept2.3.1 診斷狀態分類（Condition Profile.category）
classOfTreatmentStatus 1..1CodeableConcept2.3.2 治療狀態分類（Condition Profile.category）
dateOfInitialDiagnosis 1..1dateTime2.5 最初診斷日期（Date Of Diagnosis Condition Profile.onsetPeriod.start）
diagnosticConfirmation 1..1CodeableConcept2.11 癌症確診方式（Condition Profile.evidence）
dateOfFirstContact 1..1dateTime2.4 首次就診日期（Encounter Profile.period.start）
primaryCancer 1..1Element原發性癌症
primarySite 1..1CodeableConcept2.6 原發部位（Primary Cancer Profile.bodySite）
laterality 1..1CodeableConcept2.7 側性（Primary Cancer Profile.bodySite）
histology 1..1CodeableConcept2.8 組織型態（Primary Cancer Profile.Histology）
behaviorCode 1..1CodeableConcept2.9 性態碼（Primary Cancer Profile.BehaviorCode）
gradeClinical 1..1CodeableConcept2.10.1 臨床分級/分化（Grade Clinical Profile.valueCodeableConcept）
gradePathological 1..1CodeableConcept2.10.2 病理分級/分化（Grade Pathological Profile.valueCodeableConcept）
dateOfFirstMicroscopicConfirmation 1..1dateTime2.12 首次顯微鏡檢證實日期（Date Of First Microscopic Confirmation Profile.onsetDateTime）
firstCourseOfTreatment 1..1BackboneElement癌症登記之首次療程
dateOfFirstSurgicalProcedure 1..1dateTime4.1.1 首次手術日期（First Surgical Procedure Profile.performedDateTime）
surgicalProcedureOfPrimarySite 1..1CodeableConcept4.1.4 申報醫院原發部位手術方式（Surgical Procedure Of Primary Site Profile.code）
rt 1..1Element放射治療
rtInstitute 1..1CodeableConcept4.2.1.7 放射治療機構（RT Profile.code）
rtStarted 1..1dateTime4.2.1.3 放射治療開始日期（RT Profile.performedPeriod.start）
chemotherapy 1..1Element化學治療
chemotherapyAtThisFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.3 申報醫院化學治療（Chemotherapy Profile.code）
chemotherapyStarted 1..1dateTime4.3.4 申報醫院化學治療開始日期（Chemotherapy Profile.performedPeriod.start）
hormoneSteroidTherapy 1..1Element荷爾蒙/類固醇治療
hormoneSteroidTherapyAtThisFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.6 申報醫院荷爾蒙/類固醇治療（Hormone Steroid Therapy Profile.code）
hormoneSteroidTherapyStarted 1..1dateTime4.3.7 申報醫院荷爾蒙/類固醇治療開始日期（Hormone Steroid Therapy Profile..performedPeriod.start）
immunotherapy 1..1Element免疫治療
immunotherapyAtThisFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.9 申報醫院免疫治療（Immunotherapy Profile.code）
immunotherapyStarted 1..1dateTime4.3.10 申報醫院免疫治療開始日期（Immunotherapy Profile.performedPeriod.start）
hematologicTransplantAndEndocrineProcedure 1..1Element骨髓/幹細胞移植或內分泌處置
hematologicTransplantAndEndocrineProcedureAtThisFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.11 申報醫院骨髓/幹細胞移植或內分泌處置（Hematologic Transplant And Endocrine Procedure Profile.code）
hematologicTransplantAndEndocrineProcedureStarted 1..1dateTime4.3.12 申報醫院骨髓/幹細胞移植或內分泌處置開始日期（Hematologic Transplant And Endocrine Procedure Profile.performedPeriod.start）
targetedTherapy 1..1Element標靶治療
targetedTherapyAtThisFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.3.14 申報醫院標靶治療（Targeted Therapy Profile.code）
targetedTherapyStarted 1..1dateTime4.3.15 申報醫院標靶治療開始日期（Targeted Therapy Profile.performedPeriod.start）
palliativeCare 1..1CodeableConcept4.4 申報醫院緩和照護（Palliative Care Profile.code）
otherTreatment 1..1Element其他治療
otherTreatmentAtThisFacility 1..1CodeableConcept4.5.1 申報醫院其他治療（Other Treatment Profile.code）
otherTreatmentStarted 1..1dateTime4.5.2 申報醫院其他治療開始日期（Other Treatment Profile.performedPeriod.start）
caseAdministration 1..1BackboneElement癌症登記之個案行政
abstractedBy 1..1Identifier6.1 摘錄者（Practitioner Profile.identifier）
otherFactors 1..1BackboneElement癌症登記之其他因子
height 1..1Quantity7.1 身高（Height Profile.valueQuantity/valueCodeableConcept）
weight 1..1Quantity7.2 體重（Weight Profile.valueQuantity/valueCodeableConcept）
smokingBehavior 1..1CodeableConcept7.3 吸菸行為（Smoking Behavior Profile.component.valueCodeableConcept）
betelNutChewingBehavior 1..1CodeableConcept7.4 嚼檳榔行為（Betel Nut Chewing Behavior Profile.component.valueCodeableConcept）
drinkingBehavior 1..1CodeableConcept7.5 喝酒行為（Drinking Behavior Profile.component.valueCodeableConcept）

element.short: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
element.definition:
May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element and that modifies the understanding of the element in which it is contained and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).
element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone.
element.requirements: Modifier extensions allow for extensions that *cannot* be safely ignored to be clearly distinguished from the vast majority of extensions which can be safely ignored.  This promotes interoperability by eliminating the need for implementers to prohibit the presence of extensions. For further information, see the [definition of modifier extensions](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extensibility.html#modifierExtension).
